_sText:
Cs_mi_port by max42

Extended and reworked version of de_ports so that it is now a hostage map. Full of new rooms and added features - 

Take a boat around the bay
Get stuck in jail
Watch the action on one of the 3 cameras on the map
Go to the top of the crane
Find the hidden awp and grenades in both spawns
climb the hidden ladder onto the hill - by ct spawn
Tanks near one of the old bomb sites now explode when you destroy a box

New rooms - Security Room, Restrooms, Storage rooms, generator room

Hundreds of changes made, all areas of the maps can be got at one way or another - by climbing to them using hidden 
ladders, using the drainpipes, blowing up gates.

2 of the warehouses have been completly re-built

3 hidden weapon disposits - one at ct spawn, one at t spawn and one near the hostages in the smaller building

20 player spawn points, map starts to lag if more than 8 players are on there

And of course - rescue the hostages!


Credits

max42 - mapper
ickle - researcher
